idea-plugin.name: Pop N'Lock
idea-plugin.description:
A dark theme for IntelliJ IDEs, which was inspired by pop-n-lock-theme-vscode of Luxcium.

Install:

  • From Jetbrains Marketplace: In your IDE, open File/Settings menu, find out plugins tab. Search for Pop N' Lock, then install and restart.
  • From Native Jar: Dowload PopNLock.jar from the release pages to your disk. In your IDE, open File/Settings menu, find out Plugins. Then click Install Plugin from Disk.


| More suggested installing details see: Suggested plugins.
